import React, { Component } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBBtn } from 'mdbreact'; import DocsLink from './../components/docsLink'; import SectionContainer from './../components/sectionContainer'; import DatePicker from "react-datepicker"; import "react-datepicker/dist/react-datepicker.css"; class fourthForm extends Component { state = { fullname: '', POB:'', gender:'', startDate: new Date(), religion:'', martialStatus:'', ApplicantId : window.location.href, }; submitHandler = event => { console.log({...this.state}) axios({ method: 'POST', url: 'http://localhost:9090/application-form/received', contentType: "application/json", data: {...this.state}, //config: { headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json' }}} }) .then(function (response) { //handle success //window.alert(response); console.log(response); window.alert(response.data); }) .catch(function (response) { //handle error console.log(response); }); event.preventDefault(); event.target.className += ' was-validated'; }; changeHandler = event => { this.setState({ ...this.state, [event.target.name]: event.target.value}); }; handleChange = date => { this.setState({ startDate: date }); }; render() { return (

); } } export default fourthForm;
